text: "Silly Love Songs" is a 1976 song by the band Wings. It was taken from their album Wings at the Speed of Sound and went to number 1 in the United States, Ireland and Canada, number 2 in the United Kingdom, number 66 in Japan, number 11 in the Netherlands, number 20 in Australia, number 9 in Norway and number 8 in New Zealand. It has been covered by Shirley Bassey, Johnny Logan and Ardijah where it topped the single charts in New Zealand. ==References== Category:1976 songs Category:Paul McCartney songs Category:Shirley Bassey songs Category:Johnny Logan (singer) songs Category:Funk songs Category:Disco songs
title: Silly Love Songs
